mapper.select: select r.name as roomName, r.idx as roomIdx, h.idx as hotelIdx from reservation rs join room r on rs.roomIdx = r.idx join hotel h on r.hotelIdx = h.idx where rs.mid = #{mid} and rs.status ='이용완료' r.idx = #{roomIdx};
select * from review where roomIdx = #{roomIdx} order by idx desc;
select count(idx) from review where hotelIdx = #{hotelIdx};
select * from review order by idx desc;

select r.name as roomName, r.roomNumber, r.price, r.maxPeople, r.petSizeLimit, r.petCountLimit, r.thumbnail as roomThumbnail, r.idx as roomIdx, h.name as hotelName, h.thumbnail as hotelThumbnail, h.idx as hotelIdx, rs.idx as reservationIdx, rs.checkinDate, rs.checkoutDate, rs.guestCount, rs.petCount, rs.totalPrice, (select count(*)) as roomTotal from reservation rs join room r on rs.roomIdx = r.idx join hotel h on r.hotelIdx = h.idx where rs.mid = #{mid} and rs.status ='리뷰작성' GROUP BY r.idx order by rs.checkinDate desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select idx from reservation where mid = #{mid} and status = '리뷰작성';
mapper.update: update review set content = #{vo.content} where idx = #{vo.idx};
update reservation set status = '이용완료' where reservationNo = #{vo.reservationNo};
